pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Data from the FAOSTAT Database // Download Data from the FAOSTAT Database of the Food and Agricultural Organization (FAO) of the United Nations. A list of functions to download statistics from FAOSTAT (database of the FAO http://www.fao.org/faostat/en/#data) and WDI (database of the World Bank https://data.worldbank.org/), and to perform some harmonization operations.
